label: uncl3301
comment: To identify the party enacting an instruction.

values.label: Applicant's bank
values.comment: The financial institution which is requested to issue the documentary credit.

values.label: Issuing bank
values.comment: The financial institution which issues the documentary credit, if the applicant's bank is not acting as the issuing bank.

values.label: Beneficiary's bank
values.comment: The financial institution with which the beneficiary maintains an account.

values.label: Buyer
values.comment: The buyer is responsible for carrying out the instruction.

values.label: Seller
values.comment: The seller is responsible for carrying out the instruction.

values.label: Advise-through bank
values.comment: Identifies the financial institution through which the advising bank is to advise the documentary credit.

values.label: Advising bank
values.comment: Identifies the financial institution used by the issuing bank to advise the documentary credit.

values.label: Debtor's bank
values.comment: Identifies the bank from whom payment is due.

values.label: Ordered bank
values.comment: The financial institution with which the ordering party maintains an account.
